partners.title: Our Partners
partners.description: We proudly collaborate with industry leaders to promote as many innovations as possible.

github.description: GitHub is a platform for version control and collaboration that empowers millions of developers to build software together.

mozilla.description: Mozilla champions an open internet and develops the Firefox browser, celebrated for its speed and privacy features.

google.description: Google provides innovative search, advertising, and productivity tools that have revolutionized how we access and use information.

docker.description: Docker streamlines application development by packaging software into standardized containers for development, shipment, and deployment.

react.description: React is a powerful JavaScript library for building interactive user interfaces and dynamic web applications.

node.js.description: Node.js is a fast, scalable runtime built on Chrome's V8 engine that lets developers use JavaScript for server-side programming.
